title: School Ship Tobermory
description: Follow the exploits of the children who go to a most unusual school – the sail-powered training ship Tobermory. When a film crew arrives in Tobermory Bay, Ben and Fee are invited to be extras. But their suspicions are soon aroused – is the film crew genuine, or are they up tosomething sinister? Ben and Fee soon discover the truth when they uncover a dastardly plan masterminded by a South American businessman.
author: Alexander McCall Smith
